abstract: Researchers are studying high-functioning people with schizophrenia to learn how mental health disorders can be managed while people build full, successful lives.
snippet: Researchers are studying high-functioning people with schizophrenia to learn how mental health disorders can be managed while people build full, successful lives.
lead_paragraph: It's long been thought that people with severe mental illness had limited opportunities for work, and many are advised to take on simple, low-stress jobs so as not to exacerbate their symptoms. But now researchers are studying high-functioning people with schizophrenia and its close cousin, schizoaffective disorder.

headline.main: Studying Successful People With Mental Illness
